params.forgiver: allows us to differentiate between accounts who forgive so no-one is                  forced to accept forgiveness from an account which may tarnish their history.

params.proposer: the address of the account which proposed this to ensure no-one is forced                 to accept HON they don't want to.

params.amount: the amount of HON to be created once it is honoured into existence.
params.receiver: the address who is set to take on the HON once created

accept(address).notice: erase HON by accepting the amount set in forgive()

forgive(address,uint256).notice: begin the process of erasing HON by setting the amount and address it should be removed from

honour(address).notice: create HON by accepting the amount set in propose()

propose(address,uint256).notice: begin the process of creating HON by setting the amount and address it should be added to
